inn1.comm: some swing for Umesh, but he errs in line by sliding that down leg side, Guptill misses an attempted flick
bounce from the good length area outside off, Guptill shoulders arms.  141kph that delivery
pokes outside the line of that away-going delivery from middle, gets an inside edge onto the pad
shapes away from length around off stump. Guptill plants forward and defends
bowls this a lot fuller outside off, there's some movement away as well, Guptill watches it through to MS Dhoni
play and a miss. Beauty of a delivery that leaves him late and misses Guptill's tentative poke by a whisker
once again he watches that length ball jag away a wee bit through to Dhoni. Excellent start from Umesh
floats it full outside off, Latham slices it behind point to get off the mark immediately
a thick edge flies into the third man boundary. This is bowled full on off, it swung a little as Guptill shaped to drive. Dhoni won't mind that even if it mean four for the time being
another lucky boundary. Guptill bring his bat down to drive but wants to leave it go. Too late by then as the ball deflects off the bottom edge into the third man boundary
this is a peach! Slants back in and then straightens to beat Guptill's forward push.  Very, very close to the edge
width and that has been thumped into the point boundary. This was short and sitting up nicely for Guptill to free his arms and flay that on the up. Trusted the bounce and went through with the stoke

there's the wicket that has been brought about by uncertainty outside off. Guptill is squared up as he jabs at the length delivery that flies to Rohit at second slip. There was a juggle, but he managed to hold on. Excellent comeback from Pandya
slight hesitation, but they get through. Latham dabs it behind square towards backward point. It was Williamson's call and he made it in the end
opens the bat face to steer that short of length delivery down to third man
angles a length ball across Latham, who shoulders arms
on the pads and he wrists that into the gap between midwicket and mid-on, good timing
angles a short of length delivery back into middle, defended down the pitch
nips back in from wide outside off, left alone

once again there's uncertainty as Williamson leaves a delivery he initially wanted to play. Rolls off the bottom edge to Dhoni. Coming back to the delivery, it was floated a touch ahead of good length outside off
probing away at length outside off, left alone
walks across the stumps to whip it away but is beaten for pace. That  140kph delivery  deflects off the thigh pad to the leg side
plays outside the line and his hit on the box. Played for the deviation, but this time the ball went straight on. Ouch!

late swing back into the pads, flicked towards fine leg where Umesh makes a mess of that. He didn't bend down in time after doing all the hard work of running around from fine leg towards deep square leg.
that's a crunching cover drive. Purists' delight. Plants forward and flays that between cover and mid-off
beaten by one that leaves him late. Williamson was squared up again
mistimes a drive to mid-off. The bat face turned in his hand as he pushed forward
stays inside the crease and eases that short of length delivery down to third man
gets a thick inside edge on the forward prod, down to square leg
stands tall, trusts the bounce and punches it to cover
it doesn't come much simpler than that at third man. Width on offer, Williamson slashed and the edge flew straight down Mishra's throat. He didn't have to move an inch.
floats it full and across Latham, there's a hint of away movement on that as well, left alone
as sweet as they come! This is a length delivery that had enough width for him to plant forward and hit through cover. Lovely touch
slants it full and across the batman, left alone
angled across at length, Latham watchfully leaves
works it across the line to midwicket and calls no immediately.
stifled appeal but the short of length delivery pitched outside leg and hit him on the thigh pad as he looked to turn it wide of square leg

got 'im first ball. What a jaffa from Umesh Yadav. On a good length outside off, the ball moves away just enough, like it has been doing all afternoon. Taylor sees the length, thinks he can lay bat on ball but the out swing takes the edge of his prodding bat. Not much can be done about that to be fair. India's seamers on point so far, extracting just enough away movement
ooh, another beauty! Full, just outside off. Gets this to swing back in prodigiously. Anderson leaves. Mighty close to that off stump
stays down leg this time, looking for a tad too much. The inswing helps it down the leg side for a wide
got to be careful playing that shot! Short and wide, Anderson thinks opportunity for some runs. But this ball is moving just enough. A thick inside edge and Dhoni does well, stretching to his right
full and wide outside off, no movement this time. Good leave
another wide. Bangs this in on a good length, but strays down leg. Another extra
lots of movement. Good length outside off, the ball swings back in prodigiously and Anderson misses that by a mile. Struck on the pad in front of leg. Anderson's bat hung around outside off
shortish and swerving back in, thick inside edge onto the pad. Looking in increasing discomfort against the moving ball
short and wide, that's a poor ball. Almost a wide, Latham leaves. Wickets have fallen and so Latham doesn't want to cut
nice length. Inviting some swing by pushing it fuller outside off, Latham naughtily flirts but the ball doesn't kiss the outside edge
full again outside off, coming back in. Latham pushes to mid-on. Skewed really off the inside half
bunted in the air towards midwicket. Full on middle and off, clipped away. Maybe a bit of a leading edge too
138 kph, short and wide outside off. Anderson wants to lay into his cut, but fails to connect properly. Chops it back up the pitch. Struggling for timing
brings this straighter on middle and leg, worked to midwicket. Prodigious seam movement continues
good length outside off at 141 kph, Latham opens the face of his bat and angles his bat to get one to third man
short and wide, loose delivery. Should have been punished but gets some extra bounce, responsible for the ball flying over Anderson's attempted cut
good length outside off, Anderson prods and is beaten. Virat Kohli goes up in appeal, can't believe no one has joined in. No bat on that

finally! Short and wide again, Anderson punishes it this time. Sits up outside off, Anderson plants his front foot forward, but transfers his upper body weight back and slaps the ball through cover for four. Shot
good length outside off, left alone.
142 kph, good leave. Bounces over off stump. Trusting the bounce here. Good length outside off, the ball swing back in but Anderson leaves on bounce. Played that well.
Bumrah starts with a good length delivery on middle, that awkward action helps him get some away movement. Solidly defended, head over the ball
good length around off, played away into the off side
that's a better length. Fuller than a good length outside off, close to ideal. Moves away and Latham respectfully leaves
pushes this wider outside off again, left alone by Latham
good length on off from around the wicket. Latham pushes towards mid-on with soft hands
shortish and wide outside off, slashes down to third man
full on middle from around the wicket, pushed towards mid-on
quick on the pull. reads the length early, short on off. Latham sits in his crease and pulls to deep square leg. Rolled his wrists, kept it down.
good length outside off, left alone. Anderson settling down nicely now

superb catch from Umesh! A tad too exuberant from Anderson. Full and wide outside off, was there to be hit but Anderson couldn't quite get under that. Hammers his drive straight to Umesh at mid-off, who dives to his right and somehow clings on to his reverse-cupped catch at head height. Wrong shot selection. Latham has been timing those cover drives all day. Anderson looked to muscle it.
Full and wide outside off, left
goes slightly wide of the crease outside off, too wide to draw a stroke. Left
angles it full from around the stumps, played back to the bowler
Outstanding stop by Kohli at cover.  That was struck firmly, Kohli at short cover, threw himself to his left to pull off a one-handed stop. Saved four runs
shapes to pull but is beaten for pace. It wasn't far away from the glove. Wide signalled as it was sliding down the leg side
lovely drive down the ground. Simply brought the bat down in a lovely little arc to punch that with the straight bat past mid-on. Super timing
gets behind the line of that length ball and defends
Manish Pandey with a super stop this time. Moves quickly to his right, dives full length to his right to stop that attempted run down to third man
the bounce surprises him. Latham plays outside the line as this one takes off from the length area on middle and hits him on the rib cage

this is catching practice to say the least. Ronchi checked his shot and ended up flicking it straight to Umesh at mid-on. This was much simpler and came straight back at him at a friendly pace. Ronchi's bat face turned slightly, perhaps done in for pace again. What a debut Hardik Pandya is having
beauty! Floats this full on off, it leaves him late too as Neesham shoulders arms
thick inside edge down to Rohit at fine leg. This kept coming back in to beat a tentative push outside the line
plants forward and watches the incoming length ball from outside off through to Dhoni
gets this to jag back in from outside off again. Latham watches it through to th ekeeper
a little too predictable now. Another one that's full and angled in from around the stumps, left alone
wayward delivery outside off, Neesham wouldn't have been able to reach that even if he was more than six feet tall
floats this full and across the left-hander, who hops back and across and leaves
gets this to deviate a wee bit off the seam from the length area on middle, watched through to Dhoni
sliding into the pads, worked to fine leg to bring up New Zealand's fifty
gets the direction wrong again, but he'd be delighted with the carry. Another length ball angling away, but this one was around the eighth stump. Some exercise for umpire Shamsuddin
gets on top of the bounce and tucks it down to fine leg
dabs it off the bottom edge behind the stumps
driven on the up to mid-off
attempts a drive but gets an inside edge back down the pitch
looks to flay that behind point but there's no feet movement whatsoever. Beaten
drives, gets a thick inside edge down to mid-on
143kph  that delivery. Is late on the forward defense as the inside edge rolls down to fine leg
hops back and across to whip it down to deep square leg
sees the batsman trying to walk across and angles it full and wide, left alone
gets half-forward and bunts that short ball to the off side
uppish drive but just wide of point, down to the boundary rider
nothing shot again. Plays away from the body with an angled bat, only to see the ball fizz past the edge
worked away wide of midwicket for an easy single
angles a short of length ball to Rohit at gully
tossed up outside off, pushed to cover where Kohli pulls off a diving stop
punched down to long-on for an easy single
gets underneath the flight and eases it to Umesh at long-off as they jog the single
this one drifts back in and goes with the angle, dabbed to cover
shapes to work it wide of midwicket, hits it back to the bowler instead

big, big appeal for lbw  and trust me it was very close. This is too full for Neesham to sweep, he still tries to and is struck on the pad.  Only a bit of bat could have saved him, but there wasn't any.  Dhoni went up spontaneously, but umpire Bruce Oxenford indicated it would have missed leg. Very close call.
gets half-forward and dabs it to the off side
deflects off the pad to the leg side as they steal a single
flicked into the gap, super timing that. Used the depth of the crease before making contact. Wrong line and it was put away. Lovely timing
firm push but straight to mid-off
flays that short ball straight to Kohli at cover. Hit really, really hard
gets back into the crease and opens the bat face slightly to pick the gap between cover and point
slides one back into middle, worked to midwicket
slows it down nicely, he gets forward and defends

he was denied a wicket in the last over, but it doesn't cost India much. This one holds onto the surface just a touch and Neesham chips the simplest of return catches to the bowler.  First ODI wicket for Jadhav

two in two! Unbelievable, isn't it? This one skids straight on, Santner shapes to cut but it was too close for him to play it and only managed a faint tickle through to Dhoni.  Kedar on a hat-trick  and he can't believe his luck.
worked down to long-on for an easy single
another slider that has been worked to midwicket
too full on the pads, flicked with the angle to fine leg
unfurls his wrists to help that over point, Axar with a sliding stop at third man. That was travelling
gets on top of the bounce and dabs it to cover
gets across to work that incoming length ball to midwicket
slower and fuller outside off, Bracewell mistimes a drive to mid-off
banged in short outside off, he sways out of the way quite comfortably
floater outside off, punched to cover
firm push off the back foot wide of the cover fielder at the edge of the ring
width and he's crunched that to cover again, a slight misfield but they don't risk a single
fired full on off from wide of the crease, dabbed off the front foot
tucked wide of square leg for an easy single
loopy delivery outside off, Latham was initially looking to sweep across but ended up bunting it on the up to deep cover
beaten on the drive. Latham not quite to the pitch of the ball, still looks to go through but was done in by the bounce. He was also late on the stroke.
turns it into the gap at midwicket for a quick single
floats this full outside off, defended carefully back to the bowler
toe-ends an attempted punch to the cover fielder
hops back and across to bunt a short delivery on off stump to cover

Jadhav has put down a chance at short mid-on.  Looks like the batsman tried to go up and over but didn't quit get it off the middle, and Jadhav, diving low to his right, fluffs the opportunity. He was a second or two late to move to his right and that may have cost him in the end.
slider down leg, MS Dhoni half-stops
worked wide of square leg for an easy single
punched to Pandey at cover
neat little dabble to fine leg, fetched it from outside off. Aggressive running too, to get back for the second
looks to repeat that stroke but gets an inside-edge onto the pad
cuts and misses, this one fizzed off the deck
worked with the spin to long on for an easy single
width on offer and he's crunched that into the deep cover region, wanted the second but Bracewell wasn't keen
beaten by a lifter!  Banged in short at 142kph , Bracewell squared up awkwardly as he looked to defend. Dhoni collected that well above his waist
gets back into the crease to work that length ball on off stump to mid-on
punched off the back foot but Pandey is agile at backward point. Moves quickly to his right to stop that
good bouncer, this one takes off but not before Bracewell ducks under that without a hassle
floats this full and outside off, hint of away movement, left alone
slow turn back in from outside off, punched to wide long-off for an easy single
slider on middle from around the stumps, tucked to midwicket
makes a bit of room and bunts it into the gap at cover
punched straight to cover again
gets across the stumps and dead bats that quicker delivery
slides one into the pads, beaten as he looks to flick it wide of square leg
starts with a loopy full delivery on leg which is neatly driven to long-on
too short. Drops short and wide, Latham goes back and cuts towards cover point who puts in a dive to save runs
tossed up on leg this time, swept nicely to deep backward square leg. A very productive shot for Latham
flight outside off, draws Bracewell forward, driven back
googly outside off, comes back in. Bracewell reads it off the pitch and slaps to cover
more flight on middle and off, Bracewell inside-edges his defensive push onto his pad
flat outside off, easy enough for Latham to go back and punch to long-on. Too flat from Axar
flat down leg this time, skids onto Bracewell's pad. Drifting down
flat and full on middle, a long front-foot stride to block
too short, flat down leg and a wide is called
a bit of flight outside off, driven with the spin to long-off, playing that nicely. Waiting for the ball to come to him
flat on middle and leg, easily nudged to deep backward square.
too short, too wide again. Bracewell goes back and laces a cut to deep point, another tidy over. But too quick, too short is Axar
nicely looped up on middle, but a tad too full too. Drilled to long-on
short this time! And shot! Short and wide outside off, Latham goes back, makes some room  for himself by opening up his stance and punching his cover drive through cover. Lovely timing
googly outside off, Latham goes deep in his crease and deflects to point
too full this time, driven back
81 kph, nicely played. Tossed up outside off, Latham opens up his bat face to find the gap through cover
may have been the googly again, down leg. Worked towards short fine leg. Good over for NZ
tosses this up outside off, driven back. Too full
flatter trajectory on middle and leg, no spin. Easily nudged to deep square leg.
flat outside off, pushed to cover
ooh, too full to sweep. Definitely premeditated. Almost a yorker on middle and leg, Latham gets bat on his sweep to deep backward square
too full, pushed to long-on. "Thoda se khinch ke," says Dhoni (pull it back a little)
continues to be full and worked to deep midwicket
beautiful delivery. Pulls the length back, doesn't get as much spin. Latham gets a leading edge towards point to get to a quality fifty. A really classy knock.
flight on middle, very slow through the air. Lovely legspin bowling. Blocked
and again, not too full, but slow. Defended watchfully
short, quick, flat and wide outside off. Bracewell goes back and slaps to cover
loads of flight, too full. Smashed down to long-off
nicely opens up the bat face again to drive to deep cover for one. Latham has looked largely untroubled
overly full outside off, pushed to long-on with the spin. Dhoni asking his bowler to be a little slow, a little shorter
flight outside off, pushed to cover
too straight this time, worked towards deep square leg
nicely bowled, adhering to his captain's advice. Slow outside off, Latham opens the bat and guide to point
flatter on middle and off, blocked. "Badiya, Baapu," says Dhoni (Excellent)
more flight outside off, pushed towards cover
lovely length. Draws Latham forward, not too much spin for Mishra and so Latham has time to open the face and guide to point
superb! Flight on off, tosses it up. Bracewell strides forward to defend
flatter this time outside off. Varying 'em nicely. Slapped to cover
tossed up outside off again, driven to cover

and that should be out! Certainly looked like it lobbed to midwicket. The question is whether it was a bump ball. Tosses up on middle and leg, Bracewell comes to the pitch, gets there but is undone by the length. Ends up chipping a simple catch to Rahane at midwicket, who was certain it wasn't a bump ball. Does not lob up to a fielder if it is hit into the ground. NZ slump further
nice start, clever start. The googly on middle and off, Southee drives to long-on. Wanted to play that into the off side
flat on off, extracts a little turn. Southee blocks
round-arm action, flat on off. Southee works to midwicket
very flat and short outside off, extra bounce too. Southee leaves
lots of flight outside off, defended
quick on middle and off, driven back this time. Racing through his overs here
maiden. The ball hardly left the square in that over. Flat and straight, forcing Southee to defend
flat delivery on off, Latham goes back and punches to cover
tossed up outside off, Latham gets low and nails his sweep to deep midwicket.
nice! Tosses it up outside of, draws Southee forward. Defended
flat on middle and leg, Southee goes back and works to midwicket
nice pace. Quick on middle and leg, blocked. "He isn't going to do anything, keep it there," MS screams to his bowler
tossed up outside off, Southee comes forward and smothers his lofted drive to long-off.
good length outside off, Southee looks to punch from the crease but is beaten

dropped! An absolute sitter. Umesh Yadav has run around and shelled a relatively easy opportunity. A good short delivery on middle, Southee looks to pull but is clearly beaten for pace. Gets a thick top edge which is skied to fine leg. Umesh runs in, puts his hands in front of him and drops it by his thighs. Did not get in a good position
fullish on middle and leg, worked away through midwicket
another short delivery on middle and leg. Southee is beaten by some extra bounce and wears the blow
shot! Signs of a true surface. Good length outside off, Southee stays leg side of the ball and punches the ball through cover. Clean stroke, superb timing
picks the length early this time and dispatches it away through midwicket. Bumrah attempts another shortish delivery, but Southee was waiting. Cross-batted swat through midwicket.
lovely batting. Uses his feet, gets to the pitch and drives to mid-off. Calls immediately because he knew how hard he had it, and got one
shortish on middle and leg, Southee goes back and works to deep midwicket
tosses it up. Latham comes to the pitch again and drives to long-on. Class from Latham
oh, yes. Superb shot. Shimmies down the pitch after seeing some flight, and then opens up his bat face to loft the ball inside-out over cover. Top-order stroke
flight outside off, steered to point. A quick throw and a shrewd deflection from Dhoni, but Southee was sade
tossed up again outside off, driven down to long-off
flight on off, defended
tossed up on middle, short. Spins a touch and gets Southee's leading edge, just wide of Pandey at midwicket
overpitched flight outside off, easily pushed to long-on
short and wide outside off, Southee misses a simple cut stroke
flat again on middle, a solid block
that's massive! A bit of flight from Axar, Southee comes down, reads the length and lofts the ball wayyyyy over long-off. With the thin air, it was always going to be six! Great ball-striking
flight outside off, defended towards short cover
nice, runs to the pitch of the ball and skews his open-faced drive to deep cover
not afraid from tossing it up on middle, glided to point
flipper, out the front of the hand. Flat outside off, skewed to point
six more! Southee opening up now. A low full toss outside off, Southee comes down, converts the googly into a full toss and mis-times his loft over long-on. Carries over the fielder with the thin air
and follows it up with a clever single to long-off. Southee looking really good now, picking his balls to hit
keeps low. Goes through the batsman and Dhoni. Flat outside off, goes through Southee's cut and Dhoni's legs for a couple
that will be four more. Too flat, too quick down leg. Southee helps it along, very fine. Races away to the fine leg fence
flat down leg, nudged towards backward square leg. Latham was ball-watching. Dhoni isn't happy. Finally, the run is completed
short and wide outside off, beats the bat
tossed up outside off, blocked
sees it slightly short and so hurries back to pull, but the problem with that is many of Axar's deliveries skid on, just like this one. Beats the pull and strikes him on the back leg, down leg stump
rather full outside off, a neat drive towards mid-off for a run.
quite full outside off, driven to cover
full and straight at 141 kph, worked away towards mid-on for one. Good stuff from Latham. Nothing flashy, just proper cricket
poor ball, and six more. Short down leg, would have been wide had Southee not got bat on that. He stays inside the line and helps it along, over fine leg for six.
four more. Terrible bowling, Short on leg with square leg up. Soithee helps it past that fielder with a swat. Keeps it on the ground and gets four
full and straight, better comeback. Thick inside edge onto the pad for one to third man
worked towards square leg to bring up his  maiden ODI fifty
fetches the sweep from outside off, down to Bumrah at deep backward square leg
slides one down leg side, whizzes past the thigh pad. Sharp take by Dhoni
solidly behind the line of that in-drifter, eased back down the pitch
another one drifting into the pads, whipped to deep square leg
stretches forward and defends
flatter and fuller outside off, he gets outside the line and sweeps it into the vacant spaces at deep square leg.
slows it down nicely and pitches it on middle, defended back to the bowler
deceived in the air but adjusts late by staying inside the crease and angling it wide of short third man. No chance of stopping that on this fast outfield

why would you try to do that when runs are coming quite easily? Beyond me. Anyway, Southee looks to go over long-on but the turn does him in as the leading edge skews towards Pandey, who takes a good catch running backwards from cover. End of a super stand, a super revival for NZ, but is it enough?
flatter one on middle and leg, whipped to deep midwicket
slides one in on middle from wide of the crease, eased back to the bowler
tossed up outside off, steered to deep point
confident looking drive to cover
quick bouncer outside off, Sodhi sways out of the way quite comfortably
short ball on his rib cage, Sodhi hops across to somehow keep that out of the way
once again nicely behind the line of that. This one was another short ball on off stump, he hopped back, got on top of the bounce to fend that
there comes the yorker, but it wasn't like Sodhi was caught unaware, jams his bat down in time to keep that out
shot of the evening! Excellent use of the feet, didn't get to the pitch but made room and then lofted it inside-out over cover

that has been deposited deep into the stands at deep square leg. Flatter and fuller on middle, he gets down on one knee and sweeps him ferociously with the spin. Far from a slog. Calculated gamble and it worked
steps out and dabs it down past the bowler for an easy single
loopy drifter on middle, Sodhi stretches forward a long way to deadbat that

the top spinner has done the trick for Mishra. You expect Sodhi, of all people, to pick those but he had no clue whatsoever. Shapes to cut but the ball kept coming back in to hit the pad and he was trapped plumb in front of middle. Umpire Shamsuddin won't get to make easier decisions than that

inn2.comm: nice shape and carry from the length area on middle, left alone by Rohit
draws him forward with a full delivery swinging away, Rohit plays it gently and the ball races away past third slip. No third man fielder, so that was a certain boundary
gets this to angle in at length from wide of the crease, jags away as well, Rohit shoulders arms
back of length delivery that moves away from outside off, left alone
gets half-forward and bunts that full delivery to the off side
right behind that line of that full delivery on middle, gently tapped back down the pitch
plants forward and plays with soft hands the full delivery that shapes away from off stump
commits himself to get onto the front foot again to defend that full-length delivery
gets this to leave Rahane, who carefully watches it through to Luke Ronchi
looks to fetch the pull from outside off,  a big chunk of the bottom part of the bat came off  when he made contact with the ball, rolls to square leg
gets forward and dabs a length ball on off side
shapes away from outside off, Rohit eases it with an angled bat to point
full and moving away from the off stump, carefully defended to short cover
too full on the pads, but there's some late movement which prevents Rahane going for a full-blooded flick, defended carefully
pulled, it was nowhere near the middle but still had enough to beat square leg and race away on this fast outfield. Once again it went off the bottom of his bat
banged in short on middle and leg, Rahane accepts the invitation to hook that but couldn't get any bat on it. Wasn't far away from the gloves
slightly squared up by the late away movement, but Rahane loosens his grip and defends that with soft hands
opens the bat face late to ease this down to third man for an easy single
nice delivery to finish, full and moving away from outside off. Left alone. Another steady over
oozing with class and confidence. This was gentle half-volley which Rahane laced past mid-off. Just a gentle push and the ball beat the fielder quite easily
gets back into the crease and defend that short ball on middle
beaten for pace. Looks to fetch the pull from around the sixth stump. Was late on the stroke as well
banged in short outside off again, this one's carefully left alone as Rahane sways out of the way
this one jags back in to hit him on the box. Rahane played for the one that nips away
just a hint of width outside off and Rahane picks the gap between cover and point. Pure wrist work!
swing and a miss. Went for a full-blooded cut Sehwag style, but couldn't get any bat to it as it moved away late
gets on top of the bounce and bunts it to the off side
this one angles back into middle from wide of the crease, Rohit is rooted to the crease as he defends. This one kept a touch low
commits himself fully forward and defends the length delivery on off

just eludes the fine leg fielder. Rohit got a top edge on the pull, but that boundary is really short and he got enough bat on it. The good thing Rohit did was to go for it without trying to keep it down
full and shaping away from outside off, left alone
draws him forward with a full delivery on off stump, Rahane covers the late movement and defends
flat pull. The fielder was in business for no more than half a second at fine leg. Rahane took him on and helped it along. Used the pace to clear the fielder. Easy
gets back into the crease and steers the short ball to point
firm push but straight to mid-off
shortens his length a wee bit this time, eased to point
takes him on and he's picked the bones out of that pull shot. Fetches this from outside off but went through with a ferocious pull that sailed into the stands beyond deep square leg.
uses the width to ease that down to third man
lovely flick of the wrists to ease that into the vacant spaces at deep midwicket
deflects a short of length delivery outside off to short third man
uppish but just lands short of the fielder coming in from mid-on
scorcher from Rahane! Bullet drive past a diving Williamson at mid-off. Too full and Rahane put that away without much fuss
this one is a nicely-timed on-drive but straight to mid-on
gets on top of the bounce and works it to square leg
shows the full face of the bat to defend back down the pitch
squared up as he defends that short of length delivery on middle
delightful wrist work from Rohit to fetch that length ball from off and punch it wide of midwicket
beaten by a peach that leaves him late. Rohit tried to pull out of that stroke but it was too late. Whizzed past the edge by then
full and shaping away from off stump, driven straight to mid-off
gets this to nip away from outside off, Rahane leaves alone
looks to force one off the back foot but gets a thick inside edge onto the pad
shapes to square drive that, but gets it off the toe end of the bat, squeezed to point
this one gets big on him and flies over the vacant gully region, to third man
Anderson fields that on the bounce at midwicket. Rohit checked his flick shot at the last moment
wayward delivery sliding down, lot of work for Ronchi and he does well by moving swiftly to his left and dive to stop that
tucked to square leg, they scamper through for a quick single
leans forward and defends that away-swinger to cover

was looking to flick that over cow corner, but missed the full delivery altogether. He was hit on the back pad too, which meant the ball didn't have to travel much. That would have crashed into middle and leg, as umpire Bruce Oxenford confirmed.
watches a full delivery outside off lodge into the keeper's gloves
gets behind the line to bunt that delivery to the off side
saved by an inside edge onto the pad. Pushed outside the line to a delivery that didn't deviate as much as Kohli anticipated
shoulders arms to a length delivery that moves away from outside off
poor from Neesham. Looked like this slipped out of his hand. Slides this one down leg, Ronchi can only get a faint glove on that as he dives across to stop that with one hand
another wayward delivery, this one isn't as bad as the previous delivery, but a wide nonetheless down the leg side
this time it's a wide outside off. What's happening, Jimmy? Wonder if it's the dew talking here
much better, closer to the stumps, Rahane punches that to backward point
this one thuds into the thigh pad and deflects to square leg, Rahane beaten on an attempted whip
gets back and across and safely negotiates that short ball
scorching drive that beats the diving cover point fielder. Too full, Kohli got a big stride forward before blasting that into the gap
uses the pace to run it down to third man
hops back and across to tap that short ball to point
gets this to move away off the seam from outside off, left alone
floats this full on middle from wide of the crease, played back down the pitch
shuffles across and turns the short ball on middle to the leg side
looked to flick but the ball shaped away to skew  off the bat towards cover
skiddy bouncer on middle and leg, Kohli briefly thinks of the hook but lets go in the end
plays back to a delivery he may have played forward at other times, no harm in the end as he defends solidly

loose shot and Rahane's gone. This was way outside off for him to try and get a bat to, but Rahane pokes at that and gets an edge that is taken superbly by Ronchi diving to his right. The bounce did the trick for Neesham
starts off with a bouncer that he slips down the leg side. It was also well over Pandey's head
he looked to smash that on the up over cover,  but is beaten comprehensively. The front foot was nowhere near the pitch of that
width there this time but Pandey is happy to let that go
that's a typical Pandey stroke. Both feet were up in the air when he slapped that over cover. Gift from Neesham, can't get away by bowling short all the time
full and wide outside off, left alone
nips back in off the seam from outside off, but Pandey's judgment is sound. Lets that go
drives, but he was playing down the wrong line, he gets another inside edge onto the pad
delightful flick shot. Guptill at square leg had no chance to get around at midwicket. Ah, those steely wrists and the bottom hand. What a combination
worked away off his hip towards deep backward square leg
banged in short but the direction is down leg side, Pandey ducks, but umpire thinks it was way down leg
hops back and tucks it down to fine leg
pulled but not entirely off the middle, cut off by Anderson at deep midwicket this time
this one is eased off the back foot to third man
goes back into the crease and angles that length ball  behind square on the off side
uses the depth of the crease to punch that into the gap between cover and point. Anderson with a sliding stop. Did superbly well by running around from deep cover to pull that back in
gets across the stumps and eases that length ball to mid-on
nurdled off his pads towards deep squar leg again
looks to slap that over point, but was late on the shot. Looked like there was a sound, but Pandey immediately shook his head as if to suggest he wasn't sure what the fuss was about
another lifter outside off, left alone
shortens his length on middle, defended off the back foot
driven with the spin to long-off
drilled down to long-off for an easy single
driven with the spin to sweeper cover. Once again it was too full
drawn forward by a delivery that drifts in and spins away just a touch, eased to the point region
makes a bit room and punches it between cover and point
hops back and across to bunt that short ball back towards the bowler
punched into the deep cover region
stays inside the crease and eases that short of length delivery towards short third man
pulled, but not entirely off the middle, down to deep midwicket
gets this to lift off the deck from a touch ahead of the length area on off stump, Kohli gets on top of the bounce and blocks
plants forward and eases that short of length delivery to point
tossed up nicely on off stump, driven to cover
gets underneath the flight and drills it down to sweeper cover
scorching drive once again to sweeper cover, Kohli quickly turned and set off for the second. Pandey was struggling but dished in a full-length dive that saved him
nowhere near the pitch of the ball as he shapes to drive that over cover, gets it off the bottom of the bat
gets back into the crease and punches it down to long on
gets underneath the flight and flays that deep cover
gets the direction wrong. Looks to swing it late by starting it from leg, but this one goes straight on to beat the flick
makes a bit of room and bunts that short ball to mid-on
crunching sound of the bat hitting ball as he punches that into the gap at deep cover
that's a flat-batted pull towards deep midwicket. He was on top of the bounce and smashed the ball into the ground. Good work by Anderson to pull the ball back in
full and moving away off the seam from outside off, left alone
solidly behind the line in defense
flicked up and over the infield, into the gap between deep square and deep midwicket
driven with the spin towards sweeper cover
this one drifts into middle, Kohli leans forward and eases it past cover
goes back to whip it over midwicket, but ends up picking Williamson there. As easy as they come. This was short, he was working it across the line but got it off the top part of the bat.
steps out and works it down to long on to get off the mark
slides one into middle and leg, Kohli works it away wide of short fine leg, back for the second quite easily
Santner had less than couple of seconds despite being at deep extra cover. That was a bullet drive and he did well to get down in time to stop that
walks into the ball with a couple of steps down the track, pushes to mid-off and sets off. Makes the run with a couple of strides
good length on off, 134 kph. Kohli looks to flick, but does so onto his own body
too straight, shortish on middle and leg. Pushed past the 30-yard circle at midwicket, both of them make it with so much ease. Superb running

oh my. Shot of the day! Aided and abetted by an overpitched delivery, on off. Kohli presents the full face of the bat and times the pants off it. Straight past, Bracewell sticks his right leg out but deflects it to the boundary instead

on the other side this time. Even better! Too full outside off, Kohli gets his front foot down gently, gets his bat down and times his cover drive to the left of mid-off. Absolutely no chance. Placement exquisite.
overpitched outside off, no swing. Kohli mis-times his drive back up the pitch
shortish and wide outside off, Dhoni leaves.
good length outside off, another leave. That's a good length, but a tad too wide to trouble MS
full outside off, Dhoni gets forward, covers any gap between bat and pad and smashes his cover drive to cover
good length outside off, Dhoni gets on his toes, gets outside the line and works the ball to deep square leg
nice lines these. Just around off, Kohli forced to defend
some nice flight from Santner to start, on off. Dhoni pushes this back to the bowler
flight on off, he comes down and closes his bat face to get the ball wide of midwicket
nice, Flight on off. A bit of drift. Defended, rightly
not a bad delivery at all, fullish on off but Kohli offers the full face ti drive to long-off with the spin
flat on off, worked away to deep midwicket
short and wide outside off, Kohli goes back and slashes his square cut to deep point to tick over
gone through mid-on and that will be four. Overpitched on off, Kohli clips his drive to the right of mid-on who dives over the ball and lets it through. Can't stop it on this outfield
that's a class shot. good length outside off, he gets on top of the bounce and opens the face to guide to third man. Not a bad delivery at all
good length outside off, blocked solidly
short down leg, a free run. Looking for the bouncer
good length outside off, Dhoni gets forward and pushes to cover
good length outside off, Dhoni leaves

the air helps, but the power in his pull made that shot. A short delivery on off, gets high. Dhoni chooses to pull and almost top-edges this waaay over the fine leg boundary. Incredible bat speed, but not in control of that shot at all
flight on off, Kohli inside-edges this towards midwicket
good length, not too full not short. Dhoni works to midwicket
too straight, nudged to square leg
keeps low. Flat delivery on off, Kohli goes back and clips to midwicket. Hits the toe end, almost got through
pushed through fuller on off and middle, driven towards the bowler who stops the run to his right
lovely end. Flight on off, and Kohli gets forward and defends immaculately
oh my. Short, wide and asking Dhoni to hit it. Dhoni comes down and laces his square cut past extra cover. Hammered
good length on off, Dhoni closes the bat face and works to wide mid-on. Not a bad ball again
pushed wide of mid-on for another scampered brace. Good length on off, worked away into the gap. Knew what they wanted straightaway
130 kph, some pace off the ball. Good length but really wide, pushed towards backward point
fifty for Virat! Another one in a chase, another one at home, another flawless innings. Easy. Good length outside off, punched to deep cover
misread the length of that. Goes deep in his crease to a full delivery but improvised well. opened his face and drove towards cover who parries it away. From nowhere, they come back for two.
flat on middle, pushed back to the bowler
driven to long-on. Too full
flat outside off, punched to deep cover
flatter delivery on middle, goes back and works to midwicket
loops this up on off, Kohli strides forward and pushes to long-off. Easy as ...
ooh, that was quite close. Flat on off and middle, Dhoni comes down the track and misses his flick. No appeal. Too far down the track? Or bat?
oh shot! Short delivery on middle, 129 kph. Sits up for Kohli to flat-bat through midwicket. Got on top of the bounce, played that down, but found the gap anyway. All class
even better. Short, slightly higher than the previous one, but wider outside off. Kohli watches the ball right onto his bat as he ramps the ball over the keeper with the open face. An upper dab

dropped. By Southee's fielding standards, dare I say he should have taken that. Decent height too. Full outside off, Kohli mis-times/checks his drive and the ball goes straight towards Southee's head. he sticks his reverse-cupped hands up but the ball bounces out and behind
good length outside off, defended
that's a poor ball. Straying down leg, flicked neatly towards backward square leg
fullish outside off, head over the ball as Kohli blocks
tossed up outside off, pushed with soft hands towards cover. Had to stretch for that
short, wide and thrashed to deep point for a single
overpitched on off, driven back towards the bowler

MS is run-out. Total breakdown in communication between the pair. Tossed up outside off, Dhoni comes down and misses his flick. The ball ricochets away towards cover off the pad. MS looks at Kohli, Kohli thinks and thinks and thinks. In the meantime, Dhoni is waiting in the middle of the pitch for conformation. Gets a negative response from Kohli, but way too late, especially because Guptill is quick to the ball. Lobs the ball back to the keeper with Dhoni stranded mid-pitch. Kohli is distraught with his decision.
good length on middle, played away into the leg side
flat outside off, Jadhav defends
another beautiful drive outside off. A half-volley outside off, Kohli leans into his cover drive and times it to perfection. Placement is good too. Santner gets across from sweeper cover to cut it in
fullish on off, properly defended
slower ball outside off, whipped to mid-on. May have wanted to go through midwicket
another pleasing cover drive and another boundary. Just leaning into the drive and timing it. Finds the gap. All requisites for boundary-scoring have been checked. The result? A boundary.
full on off, shovelled to mid-on. Handle turned in his hands
wow! Looking really good here. Too full again and hammered to the sweeper cover
flight on middle and leg, comfortably driven to long-on
flight outside off, blocked
flight outside off, drilled away to the sweeper cover. Another single
superb length that. Flight and drift from slightly wide of the crease, no turn. But nothing is going through Kohli's defense
flatter again on middle, pushed back
too full this time, driven to long-off
what a shot! Flight outside off, Kohli stretches out and superlatively times his cover drive to the right of over this time. No chance. Just awesome ball-striking this
too much flight on off, drilled to long-off. All class
edged for four. Flight outside off, draws Jadhav forward and spins it to the outside edge of Jadhav's prod. A proper edge. Shows the difference in class between these two batsmen
flatter on off, worked to square leg
and another one, this time it is closer to the sweeper cover. jadhav labours back for the second. Santner the man, a direct hit would have Jadhav
flat on middle, pushed towards midwicket
NZ cannot believe it. Flat delivery outside off, Jadhav tries a late dab but misses. Was there some glove? Ronchi nonchalantly threw the ball up. Umpire Shamsuddin says no. NZ started celebrating
worked into the leg side
flight outside off, blocked towards point.
dropped short and pulled for four. A rank long-hop is muscled over midwicket. Easy
ooh, stunning! Floated up outside off, rips past the edge
tossed up outside off, Jadhav wants the * next to his name, blocked. Not giving it away. Exactly the way to do it.

finished with six. If MS isn't there, Virat will. Dances down, gets to the pitch of the ball and nails his lofted drive easily over the bowler. Clears the boundary easily too. India go 1-0 up in the five-match series.
